Articles.Content:
I think I have discovered a new kind of bug using danny2462's glitch device.

Link: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95148-What-the-flying-hell

1. You discovered nothing, Danny discovered the bug and you replicated it, slightly different outcome doesn't change that fact.

2. You don't need to double post in multiple places, Squad reads the forums.

3. Maxmaps mentioned Danny's discovery in the last Squadcast as being a low priority because it's the type of issues they can simply say "well don't do that then". Really, it's very obscure.

4. This is the modded installs support forum. The "bug" in question is stock.
